video.title: When Calls the Heart
video.synopsis: Leaving behind her upper-crust city roots, a woman journeys west in the early 1900s to become a teacher in a small Canadian mining community.

episodes.synopsis: As Elizabeth nervously faces her first day of teaching, Jack must figure out which doomed miner wrote a personal message on a plank found in the mine.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: When the coal company orders the town's widows to move and make way for new miners, Elizabeth devises a plan to keep the women in their homes.
episodes.title: Cease and Desist

episodes.synopsis: While Jack investigates the suspicious church fire, Elizabeth tries to figure out why little Rosaleen can't speak and is terrified of miner Wendell.
episodes.title: A Telling Silence

episodes.synopsis: Jack questions Cat about the fire after finding whale oil cans in her shed, while Elizabeth is baffled when a poor student gives her a costly gift.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: The arrival of new miners in Coal Valley creates excitement among the townswomen, but Jack regards Billy, Elizabeth's earnest suitor, with suspicion.
episodes.title: The Dance

episodes.synopsis: As the town readies for the Miners' Games, Elizabeth and Billy's courtship heats up, and Jack investigates some thefts he suspects Billy is behind.
episodes.title: These Games

episodes.synopsis: Eager to start her life anew, Abigail concocts a bold but costly business proposition, while Elizabeth and Jack go to bat for a struggling student.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Adam, the mine disaster's sole survivor, finally returns home but struggles to readjust. On short notice, Elizabeth puts on the Founders' Day play.
episodes.title: Perils of the Soloists

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth's visiting sister causes a stir when she brings a wounded man to town, while Jack invites Elizabeth to a romantic dinner at Abigail's café.
episodes.title: Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: As Elizabeth yearns for the absent Jack, Abigail pumps Gowen for details about the mine disaster, and Julie grows close to fugitive outlaw Nathaniel.
episodes.title: Love Comes First

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Elizabeth's reunion is threatened by the appearance of a woman from Jack's past. Abigail welcomes forensics investigator Bill Avery to town.
episodes.title: Rules of Engagement

episodes.synopsis: Helped by Jack, Bill investigates the mine explosion, while Elizabeth must decide whether to accept a job offer back East or remain in Coal Valley.
episodes.title: Prelude to a Kiss
